thread.title: Homeless man implicated in cold-case rapes sexually assaults third woman, Cleveland police say
thread.title_full: Homeless man implicated in cold-case rapes sexually assaults third woman, Cleveland police say

author: Adam Ferrise, cleveland.com
title: Homeless man implicated in cold-case rapes sexually assaults third woman, Cleveland police say
text: Michael Frierson, 47, is accused of raping a woman last week, five months after he was charged in two cold case rapes.
